EmailTemplate.description: Initiate Credit Approval for Host Credit
EmailTemplate.name: Initiate Credit Approval for Host Credit
EmailTemplate.subject: Initiate Credit Approval for Host Credit - {!Opportunity.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Sales Person/Sales Analyst,
Please request a formal Customer Credit Assessment for the PPA Opportunity below.
Performing a credit assessment on prospective PPA Customers is an important step to ensure that we do not spend resources on projects that may not get financed.
Please complete and submit the Credit Review Request form saved on the G\drive: G:\Structured Finance\Public\PPA Model\PPA Credit Review Request
Click on the link to see the Opportunity. {!Opportunity.Link} Thanks.
